titleInfo.title: ‘Route of Lieut. McDonald 12th N.I. Ensign Monteith Engineers. Performed by Order of Brigr. Genl. Malcolm Embassador to the Court of Persia. W. Monteith Ensgn Engineers'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink with wash on paperDimensions:460 x 479 mm, on sheet 662 x 684 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Relief shown by hachures.Routes indicated in red.Inscriptions:On the recto in the bottom right-hand corner signature ‘John Garstin Colonel of Engr. Surveyor General Fort William 7th of January 1811’. 'Recd. 13th J'Labels:On the recto in the lower left below title black ink oval stamp ‘E.I. COMP’S LIBRARY’.
